name: Whodunnit
overview: Whodunnit is a murder mystery game for the Commodore VIC-20 which is loosely based on the board game Clue. It was published by Sophisticated Games in 1983. Mind boggling and fiendishly difficult detective game for 1 - 6 players with a genuinely different crime every time. Twelve guests have gathered for drinks at Murder Manor, but by the end of the evening one of them will be dead. To find the murderer you must ask questions, establish movements, motives, alibis etc. Then make your arrest and watch the trial at the Old Bailey to see if you are successfully.
